ComicInfo.Summary:
Mistress Nyx continues her war against the last vestiges of humanity, while Vampirella begins the process of rebuilding the Danse Macabre. What sort of bargain has she made with Abaddon, the Angel of the Apocalyse? And what part will the vampire lord, Mazarin and his Undead play in the growing conflict?
